file_insights.description: Modified buildFieldsJson() method to support message reactions

patterns_discovered: Extensible JSON builder with numbered fields
App extensions stored in field 16 for future features
Reactions stored as a nested JSON object with emojis as keys and sender hashes as values
gotchas_discovered: Original method did not support reactions parameter
Need to handle null/empty reactions gracefully
Requires converting reactions map to nested JSON structure
recommendations: Add unit tests for new reactions parameter in buildFieldsJson()
Document the new reactions parameter in method comments
Consider creating a dedicated data class for app extensions
Validate maximum number of reactions and sender hashes to prevent potential performance issues
